• Hi! I'm June!

    I like coding cool apps for the web.

    Full-Stack Developer

    About Me

    Ever since high school, I’ve always had an interest in web design or development. And then the almighty pandemic hit and I saw an opportunity and ran with it.

    Today I am continuing to further my knowledge and proficiency by taking courses and completing for small business clients.

    I hope that I can be in a state of consistent growth for the rest of my career. In doing so I will be able to provide exceptional web applications.

    You can always find me outdoors, with a coffee in hand. I’m also a big gamer, love reading, and probably spend way too much time skateboarding.
